products.title: Hive Blackout Green Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout green perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Sea Green Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their vitra blackout sea green fabric is a bright, fun green with a hint of blue colour, the stylish shade is modern and contemporary and will work well within the home or office. Sea green is bold enough to be used as a statement accent within your interior styling. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Lime Green Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their vitra blackout lime green fabric is a fabulous fresh green tone, perfect to add a bright pop of colour into your interiors, this shade will work beautifuly as an accent with chic grey shades. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style.

products.title: Bella Blackout Vine Green Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This lush green perfect fit roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure perfect fit blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Midas Stripe Blackout Aqua Green Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: The midas stripe blackout range comes in a variety of beautiful colour tones that will stand out in any room. The blackout feature means you can control how much light you want in the room. Aqua green is a stunning green/ teal shaded blind. Great to introduce colour into your interior styling. Product id: sdb-pfr0442 fabric colour: aqua green material: 100% polyester lining: white blackout backing - see sample headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes midas stripe blackout aqua green perfect fit roller blind in blue/green.
